title: DiRT Rally – v1.23
body:
DiRT Rally – v1.23


Genres/Tags: Racing, Rally, Simulation, 3D
Company: Codemasters
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI7
Original Size: 30.8 GB
Repack Size: from 8.8 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet] EN/RU Only
  • FreeTorrents EN/RU Only
  • Tapochek.net [magnet] EN/RU Only
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on DiRT.Rally.v1.1-RELOADED ISO release: rld-dirtra11.iso (28,593,258,496 bytes)
  • All updates till v1.23 applied, crack replaced with ALI213
  • Missing localizations added – French, Spanish, German, Russian, Brazilian & Italian (3.8 GB) – thanks to Christsnatcher!
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature – you can skip downloading and installing of language packs you don’t need and/or movies
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 30.8 to 8.8~13.5 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes: ~25 minutes on 8-cores CPU; ~45 minutes on 4-cores CPU + HDD; up to 1.5 hour on 2-cores CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 42 GB (depending on selected languages)
  • Use “Language Selector” in game root to select game language if you installed it with several langpacks
  • Repack uses ZTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Built by Codemasters and road tested over 60 million miles by the DiRT community, DiRT Rally is the ultimate rally experience. It captures the essence of what makes rally unique like no other game – that sense of trying to remain in control of your emotions, as you hurtle along dangerous, undulating roads at breakneck speed, aiming to squeeze everything out of your car whilst knowing that one crash could irreparably harm your stage time.

Every stage tests you differently, as you race on the edge of control across varying surfaces in a range of environments such as snow, ice, tarmac and dirt and as you tackle a variety of weather types. As the car suffers attrition, you need to account for mechanical damage whilst your dedicated rally team tries to keep you competitive with time-limited repairs. Stages string together and each rally becomes a marathon-like test of concentration and skill as you trust in your co-driver, chasing that ever-elusive perfect run.

DiRT Rally also includes officially licensed World Rallycross content, allowing you to experience the breathless, high-speed thrills of some of the world’s fastest off-road cars as you trade paint with other drivers at some of the series best-loved circuits, in both singleplayer and high-intensity multiplayer races.

English voiceovers are build-in with main files and used for lossless restoraion of other languages.

You can skip downloading of other language files and/or movies you don’t need. Here is the list of selective files:

  • fg-optional-videos.bin (animated menu background, attract intro)
  • fg-optional-tutorial-videos.bin (tutorial movies)
  • fg-optional-russian.bin
  • fg-optional-brazilian.bin
  • fg-optional-french.bin
  • fg-optional-german.bin
  • fg-optional-italian.bin
  • fg-optional-spanish.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with German UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “optional” files, but download [b]fg-optional-german.bin[/b] & all main files (01-09).

Optional videos

  • Tutorial movies cover many aspects of the game, so they can be useful for novices
  • Background video is pretty useless, and when absent is replaced with moving pictures by game engine
  • Attract intro is a short advertising shown before you press any key after the launch – also pretty useless

Backwards Compatibility

Due to a large amount of new/changed files, this repack IS NOT COMPATIBLE with my previous repacks of DiRT Rally.
